data.title: Quaint
data.text: Jules has a small coffee house feel. Quaint and charming. Nice decor with oak floor. This would be a great place for intimate conversation or a small business meeting. Coffee bar and decent bottled wine and beer selection. Friendly staff. Menu more extensive than most "coffee bar" menus. Friendly staff.  Doesn't strike me as an ideal place for kids, although I know families would be welcome. Great place!

data.title: Great place for any meal!!
data.text: I love Jule's!! We love walking to Jule's in the summer and having breakfast.  The staff is always wonderful and refills our coffee when we ask.  It is also great for lunch and dinner.  Unique food that is always fresh.

data.title: Pizza, Salads, Sandwiches and daily specials wtih Coffee and Wine
data.text: This a  little gem in St. Cloud. It is cozy and warm. Small enough to be quite but big enough to accommodate larger groups. Food is scratch made and always excellent. Service has always been very good as well. They have date night pizza and wine deals and are an excellent place for lunch or dinner. Never disappointed.

data.title: Very tasty, worth the wait.
data.text: This is a cozy place, good flavors, artistic atmosphere but they seem to be understaffed. We came at noon and didn't get our orders until 12:50. Be sure to budget your time, it's worth the wait.

data.title: Best BBQ Chicken Pizza Ever
data.text: My wife said it was the place to go and she was right.  Outstanding pizza with a couple of local beers (Cold Spring Brewery).  Best time to go is immediately after the show next door starts.

data.title: Worth every penny...
data.text: Delicious and great service!  Everything from the hummus to the Reuben with mushroom sandwich to the dessert and wine!  The art and decor is divine!  However not many tables so get there early...

data.title: Excellent food, excellent service!
data.text: Went to Jules Bistro for dinner and we were very pleasantly surprised at how great the food was! Everything was fresh, cook to order. My husband and I split some bruschetta (which was soooo good!) and then split the portobello pizza. The portion was perfect. I would note that had we not split an appetizer, the pizza wouldn't have been enough to share. The server was attentive and courteous. All in all, great experience and we will be returning soon!

data.title: Great stop before Paramount preformances...
data.text: Arrived early for show at Paramount and stopped in for light early dinner.  Ordered grilled Italian deli, grilled ham & cheese, and wine.  Sandwiches were excellent as were the wine selections.  Menu has many interesting sandwiches, wraps, and pizza.  Everything we saw looked great.  Wine list a bit limited, but all varieties covered and all appeared to be excellent quality choices.  Only about 10 tables, so consider calling ahead for reservations.  A bit drafty by single front door... you may want a table towards the back on chilly days.  Summer days they have outdoor tables.

data.title: Best restaurant in St. Cloud
data.text: Jules is a quaint place perfect for lunch or dinner. The food is fresh and delicious. We try to eat here once a week and highly recommend it. The salt water taffy pieces you get on the way out top off a perfect meal every time!

data.title: Delicious lunch
data.text: I have eaten lunch here a number of times in the last year. This is a really good place to get something a little nicer than your average lunch, and have a selection that is much more creative. In our group we had a Tuna melt and a pizza. Both were excellent. There were some really interesting meals for specials. My pizza and a latte cost about $14. It is a small restaurant and has a great atmosphere. I would recommended it for a lunch in the downtown area.

data.title: Unique menu items
data.text: This restaurant is cute and has some menu items that aren't found in other restaurants.  They have good homemade soup.

data.title: Charming and friendly
data.text: Very agreeable but little place.  Menu is limited but good and service is excellent.  Very crowded with downtown events

data.title: Best Pizza in Town!
data.text: Need to try their pizzas. They are hand made so the crust is not a perfect circle. I also love the salads. It is a small restaurant with a BIG taste. We can sit for hours and enjoy the outdoor dining experience (summer months)

data.title: Loved it!
data.text: I really like this place, love the atmosphere! Got a pizza and it was delicious! Would recommend to friends and family!

data.title: Great food, staff and atmosphere!
data.text: This little gem has a cozy feeling, diverse menu with good food and the staff were awesome.  It is a smaller venue downtown, so parking and immediate seating are not a guarantee.

data.title: Good Food - Good Prices - Fresh
data.text: A favorite of my son and I.  He loves their wood fired pizza and I'm a fan of their Rachel Sandwich.  During the summer they have little outdoor tables.  Good ambiance.

data.title: Pleasantly surprised
data.text: On approach there were college students drinking beer and drinking beer and the server tending to them was short tempered. We walked in and were say y st a table adjacent to the kitchen with only a curtain separating the two. The decor is interesting, the wine selection very good, the menu simple, the food delicious and the lady Angela who was not outside took excellent care of us.

data.title: Ok to good
data.text: The food for lunch was good. Took a while to get it despite a pretty empty place. Also the waitress inappropriately brought the curried squash soup because she was wrong about what the soup of the day was. She told us it was chicken vegetable chowder but she just gave us curried squash. Shouldn't you tell us first?  The sandwiches were very good.

data.title: Amazing Desserts!
data.text: Located in downtown St. Cloud it is a cozy restaurant with a nice wine menu and excellent salads and pizzas but the dessert menu is enough to show up for!  Great homemade selection

data.title: Great recommendation from friend
data.text: Quaint spot, great food, great downtown location , especially nice this coming summer, so you can stroll the streets. Love the date night deal, saw others doing it too. unique variety of pizzas and apps. will go back for sure, soon we hope
